definition: pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system

sentences.english: Lu Lu pattern (six black keys and six white keys) keyboard is the outcome of the syncretism of Eastern and Western civilizations.
sentences.chinese: “律吕式键盘”是东西方文明交汇融合的产物。

definition: pre-Tang names of the five notes of the pentatonic scale, corresponding roughly to do, re, mi, sol, la
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony

five notes of pentatonic scale, roughly do, re, mi, sol, la/five classes of initial consonants of Chinese phonetics, namely: 喉音[hou2 yin1], 牙音[ya2 yin1], 舌音[she2 yin1], 齒音|齿音[chi3 yin1], 唇音[chun2 yin1]
music/rhyme and rhythm/initial, 音[yin1], and final and tone, 韻|韵[yun4], of a Chinese character/phoneme
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经

Six Methods of forming Chinese characters, according to Han dictionary Shuowen 說文|说文 - namely, two primary methods: 象形 (pictogram), 指事 (ideogram), two compound methods: 會意|会意 (combined ideogram), 形聲|形声 (ideogram plus phonetic), and two transfer methods: 假借 (loan), 轉注|转注 (transfer)
